001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.AbstractAtomicOrUnionType;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.DataTypeItemType;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.JsonUtil;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util.XmlEventUtil;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLEventReader2;
021import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
022import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.net.URI;
026
027import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
028import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
029import javax.xml.stream.events.Characters;
030import javax.xml.stream.events.StartElement;
031import javax.xml.stream.events.XMLEvent;
032
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
034
035/**
036 * Provides a basic Java type adapter implementation. This implementation should
037 * be the parent class of all Java type adapter implementations.
038 *
039 * @param <TYPE>
040 *          the raw Java type this adapter supports
041 * @param <ITEM_TYPE>
042 *          the metapath item type corresponding to the raw Java type supported
043 *          by the adapter
044 */
045public abstract class AbstractDataTypeAdapter<TYPE, ITEM_TYPE extends IAnyAtomicItem>
046    implements IDataTypeAdapter<TYPE> {
047  /**
048   * The default JSON property name for a Metaschema field value.
049   */
050  public static final String DEFAULT_JSON_FIELD_VALUE_NAME = "STRVALUE";
051
052  @NonNull
053  private final Class<TYPE> valueClass;
054  @NonNull
055  private final IAtomicOrUnionType<ITEM_TYPE> itemType;
056
057  /**
058   * Construct a new Java type adapter for a provided class.
059   *
060   * @param valueClass
061   *          the Java value object type this adapter supports
062   * @param itemClass
063   *          the Java type of the Matepath item this adapter supports
064   * @param castExecutor
065   *          the method to call to cast an item to an item based on this type
066   */
067  protected AbstractDataTypeAdapter(
068      @NonNull Class<TYPE> valueClass,
069      @NonNull Class<ITEM_TYPE> itemClass,
070      @NonNull AbstractAtomicOrUnionType.ICastExecutor<ITEM_TYPE> castExecutor) {
071    this.valueClass = valueClass;
072    this.itemType = new DataTypeItemType<>(this, itemClass, castExecutor);
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
077  public TYPE toValue(Object value) {
078    return (TYPE) value;
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  public Class<TYPE> getJavaClass() {
083    return valueClass;
084  }
085
086  @Override
087  public IAtomicOrUnionType<ITEM_TYPE> getItemType() {
088    return itemType;
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  public boolean canHandleQName(IEnhancedQName nextQName) {
093    return false;
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public String getDefaultJsonValueKey() {
098    return DEFAULT_JSON_FIELD_VALUE_NAME;
099  }
100
101  @Override
102  public boolean isUnrappedValueAllowedInXml() {
103    return false;
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  public boolean isXmlMixed() {
108    return false;
109  }
110
111  @Override
112  public TYPE parse(XMLEventReader2 eventReader, URI resource) throws IOException {
113    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
114    XMLEvent nextEvent;
115    try {
116      while (!(nextEvent = eventReader.peek()).isEndElement()) {
117        if (!nextEvent.isCharacters()) {
118          throw new IOException(String.format("Invalid content %s",
119              XmlEventUtil.toString(nextEvent, resource)));
120        }
121        Characters characters = nextEvent.asCharacters();
122        builder.append(characters.getData());
123        // advance past current event
124        eventReader.nextEvent();
125      }
126
127      // trim leading and trailing whitespace
128      String value = ObjectUtils.notNull(builder.toString().trim());
129      try {
130        return parse(value);
131      } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
132        throw new IOException(
133            String.format("Malformed data '%s'%s. %s",
134                value,
135                XmlEventUtil.generateLocationMessage(nextEvent, resource),
136                ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
137            ex);
138      }
139    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
140      throw new IOException(ex);
141    }
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * This default implementation will parse the value as a string and delegate to
146   * the string-based parsing method.
147   */
148  @Override
149  public TYPE parse(JsonParser parser, URI resource) throws IOException {
150    String value = parser.getValueAsString();
151    if (value == null) {
152      throw new IOException(
153          String.format("Unable to get null value as text%s",
154              JsonUtil.generateLocationMessage(parser, resource)));
155    }
156    // skip over value
157    parser.nextToken();
158    try {
159      return parse(value);
160    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
161      throw new IOException(
162          String.format("Malformed data '%s'%s. %s",
163              value,
164              JsonUtil.generateLocationMessage(parser, resource),
165              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
166          ex);
167    }
168  }
169
170  @SuppressWarnings("null")
171  @Override
172  public String asString(Object value) {
173    return value.toString();
174  }
175
176  @Override
177  public void writeXmlValue(
178      Object value,
179      StartElement parent,
180      XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory,
181      XMLEventWriter eventWriter)
182      throws IOException {
183    try {
184      String content = asString(value);
185      Characters characters = eventFactory.createCharacters(content);
186      eventWriter.add(characters);
187    } catch (IllegalArgumentException | XMLStreamException ex) {
188      throw new IOException(ex);
189    }
190  }
191
192  @Override
193  public void writeXmlValue(Object value, IEnhancedQName parentName, XMLStreamWriter2 writer) throws IOException {
194    String content;
195    try {
196      content = asString(value);
197      writer.writeCharacters(content);
198    } catch (IllegalArgumentException | XMLStreamException ex) {
199      throw new IOException(ex);
200    }
201  }
202
203  @Override
204  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator) throws IOException {
205    try {
206      generator.writeString(asString(value));
207    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
208      throw new IOException(ex);
209    }
210  }
211
212  @Override
213  public abstract ITEM_TYPE newItem(Object value);
214}
